synopsis.text:
With the backdrop of Italy, an undercover government agency, disguised as a Social Welfare Organization, is responsible for transforming the lives of critically injured young girls. Utilizing cutting-edge cybernetic technology, these girls are given a second chance at life, but not without a cost. Their newfound existence comes with a hidden agenda: to serve as ruthless assassins, carrying out the clandestine operations of the Italian government.

The story revolves around Henrietta, a young girl who was once a victim of a brutal family massacre. Rescued and revived by the agency, she is now equipped with advanced cybernetic enhancements, making her a lethal killing machine. Despite her cold-blooded assignments, Henrietta's heart still yearns for the love and affection she once knew, even as she grapples with the reality of her manufactured emotions.

Working alongside her is Jose, her partner and caretaker, who is torn between his duty to the organization and his growing fondness for Henrietta. As they delve deeper into their missions, the girls, including Henrietta, must confront the harsh reality of their existence. With each trigger pulled, they lose a piece of their humanity, edging closer to becoming the heartless weapons they were designed to be.

In this tragic tale, these cybernetic girls navigate the complexities of their emotions, relationships, and the grim reality of their purpose, all while clinging to the fading memories of their past lives. Will they succumb to their programmed destiny, or will they manage to reclaim what remains of their humanity? Only time will tell.
